availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John P. Rascoe (Caldwell Co, Ky, farmer and dry goods clerk)

body.p: Caldwell County, farmer and dry goods clerk. North Carolina native. Married to Elizabeth S. Barnes Rascoe in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on December 21, 1848. Father of Mary A. Rascoe, George Rascoe, John Rascoe, and Bettie Rascoe. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Dry goods clerk in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 509A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 107.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 509A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 299 of 439 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
